    • findOrders

      public List<Order> findOrders(Connection con, int userId) throws DBException
      Return List of Order entity from DB by User identifier and Connection.
      Specified by:
      findOrders in interface OrderDAO
      Parameters:
      con - Pool connection.
      userId - User identifier. Can be null
      Returns:
      List of User Orders or List of ALL Orders when userId=null.
      Throws:
      DBException - if there is a database access error.

    • createOrder

      public void createOrder(Connection con, int userId, Basket basket) throws DBException
      DB transaction. Create new Order entity in DB by given Connection, User identifier and his Basket entity.
      Specified by:
      createOrder in interface OrderDAO
      Parameters:
      con - Pool connection.
      userId - User identifier
      basket - Basket entity of current User
      Throws:
      DBException - if there is a database access error.
